title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
description: A classic, healthy, and satisfying breakfast. Creamy avocado on crisp whole grain toast, topped with a perfectly poached egg for a rich, savory start to your day.
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper
Poach eggs in simmering water for 3-4 minutes
Top with poached eggs and red pepper flakes

title: Berry Oatmeal Smoothie Bowl
description: A vibrant and nutrient-packed smoothie bowl that's as beautiful as it is delicious. Blended oats and mixed berries create a thick, creamy base perfect for your favorite toppings.
instructions: Blend oats, banana, berries and almond milk
Top with chia seeds and honey

title: Breakfast Burrito
description: A hearty, protein-packed burrito to fuel your morning. Fluffy scrambled eggs, black beans, and melted cheese are wrapped in a warm tortilla for a portable and delicious meal.
instructions: Layer eggs, beans, cheese and salsa on tortillas

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: An elegant and simple breakfast or snack. Layers of creamy Greek yogurt, sweet berries, and crunchy granola create a perfect balance of textures and flavors.
instructions: Layer yogurt, berries and granola in glass

title: French Toast
description: A timeless breakfast indulgence. Slices of bread soaked in a rich, cinnamon-vanilla egg batter and pan-fried to golden-brown perfection, ready to be drizzled with maple syrup.
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla and cinnamon
Cook bread until golden brown on both sides

title: Quinoa Salad Bowl
description: A light, refreshing, and wholesome lunch bowl. Fluffy quinoa is tossed with fresh vegetables, chickpeas, and a zesty lemon vinaigrette for a healthy and satisfying meal.
instructions: Combine quinoa and chickpeas in bowl

title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: A classic salad transformed into a convenient and delicious wrap. Tender grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, and creamy Caesar dressing all rolled into a soft tortilla.
instructions: Layer lettuce, chicken, Parmesan and croutons

title: Minestrone Soup
description: A hearty and comforting Italian vegetable soup. Packed with beans, pasta, and a rich tomato broth, this soup is a complete meal in a bowl.
instructions: Saut√© onions, carrots and celery in oil
Add broth and tomatoes, bring to boil
Add pasta and cook for 10 minutes
Stir in beans and cook 5 more minutes

title: Caprese Sandwich
description: The simple flavors of Italy in a delicious sandwich. Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and fragrant basil are layered on toasted ciabatta with a drizzle of balsamic glaze.
instructions: Brush bread with olive oil and toast
Layer mozzarella, tomato and basil on bread

title: Tuna Salad
description: A quick and classic tuna salad recipe that never disappoints. Perfect for sandwiches, wraps, or served on a bed of greens for a light and easy lunch.

title: Veggie Burger
description: A juicy and flavorful veggie burger that's perfect for a quick and satisfying meal. Topped with classic fixings, it's a great meatless option for any burger lover.
instructions: Cook burger patty according to package

title: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
description: An elegant, healthy, and incredibly simple dinner. Perfectly grilled salmon fillets are served alongside tender-crisp asparagus for a restaurant-quality meal at home.
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper and garlic
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side

title: Beef Tacos
description: A fun and flavorful taco night favorite. Seasoned ground beef is served in crispy taco shells with all the classic toppings for a customizable and crowd-pleasing dinner.
instructions: Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy and decadent Italian rice dish. Arborio rice is slowly cooked in a savory broth with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese to create a rich, comforting, and elegant meal.
instructions: Saut√© onions and mushrooms in butter
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Pour in wine and cook until absorbed
Add broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly
When rice is creamy, stir in Parmesan

title: Chicken Curry
description: A fragrant and flavorful chicken curry that's surprisingly easy to make. Tender chicken pieces are simmered in a creamy coconut milk and curry spice sauce.
instructions: Heat oil and saut√© onions and garlic
Add chicken and cook until browned
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes
Add peas and cook 5 more minutes

title: Margherita Pizza
description: The quintessential Neapolitan pizza, celebrating simplicity and quality ingredients. A thin crust topped with vibrant tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and aromatic basil.
instructions: Roll out dough on baking sheet
Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil

title: Apple Pie
description: The ultimate American dessert. A flaky, buttery crust filled with sweet, tender apples and warm spices like cinnamon and nutmeg. Perfect with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
instructions: Mix apples with sugar, flour and spices
Line pie plate with one crust
Add apple mixture and dot with butter
Cover with second crust and seal edges

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: The perfect chocolate chip cookie: crispy on the edges, soft and chewy in the middle, and loaded with melted chocolate chips. A timeless treat for all ages.
instructions: Beat in eggs one at a time
Mix in flour and baking soda
Drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheet

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: A rich and creamy homemade vanilla ice cream made with just a few simple ingredients. The perfect base for sundaes, or delicious all on its own.

title: Cheesecake
description: A classic New York-style cheesecake with a rich, dense, and smooth filling on a buttery graham cracker crust. A truly decadent and impressive dessert.
instructions: Mix crumbs, sugar and butter for crust
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth
Add eggs one at a time

title: Fruit Salad
description: A simple, colorful, and refreshing fruit salad. A mix of seasonal fruits is tossed in a light honey-lime dressing to enhance their natural sweetness.
